author: adrianc
msg: More work on the Mini-language <simple-method> element: I removed the attributes that specify some of the environment map (bindings) keys. Those keys should be under the control of the framework so they are consistent across scripting languages.

author: mturk
msg: Few more places that needs to decrement the connection counter when the socket is closed

author: mturk
msg: make sure connections count doesn't go negative. Decrement only if socket was actually open
